mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SA_ACL_MASTER A WHERE GUID = #GUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SA_ACL_MASTER (GUID, PARENTGUID, CONDITIONGUID, CONDITIONNAME, VALUEGUID, VALUENAME, MASTERVALUEGUID, MASTERVALUENAME, ACLNAME, POSITION, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, LIBRARYGUID) VALUES( #GUID#, #PARENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONDITIONGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONDITIONNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #VALUEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #VALUENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MASTERVALUEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MASTERVALUENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ACLNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #POSITION#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LIBRARYGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#)
mapper.update:
UPDATE SA_ACL_MASTER
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# PARENTGUID=#PARENTGUID#, LIBRARYGUID=#LIBRARYGUID#, CONDITIONGUID=#CONDITIONGUID#, CONDITIONNAME=#CONDITIONNAME#, VALUEGUID=#VALUEGUID#, VALUENAME=#VALUENAME#, ACLNAME=#ACLNAME#, POSITION=#POSITION#, DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION#, MASTERVALUEGUID=#MASTERVALUEGUID#, MASTERVALUENAME=#MASTERVALUENAME#
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
